评论详情: This was so much fun to wear to Ren fair!! I was going for a Ravenclaw princess Mage. 😁💙 The blue color is striking, the lace and details are gorgeous, and the neckline is stunning! I was worried it wouldn't fit well due to the elastic waist and side zipper, but it fit very well... snug but the elastic adds give. The length was perfect for me I am about 5'5" and 250 lbs. The neckline in the back was not too low, just above the middle of my back.  Some complaints were of the material - I AM sensitive to fabrics, and I sew/quilt myself. I found it to be a durable material, but not overly scratchy to wear. My skin was fine after wearing all day.. no irritations. 😄

I haven't actually worn this out yet because I just got it, but I'm obsessed!!!! It's so cute and is a flattering fit and it has pockets which I didn't realize when I bought it, and is a bonus!! It's a light weight material, and comfortable. For reference, I'm 5' 4", 135 lbs, and I bought a Small and it fits perfectly.
GREAT FABRIC, GREAT FIT, WASHES WELL, COLD WATER, LINE DRY, I AM 120LBS 5'6" LOVE THE DARK GREEN COLOR
Stunning and comfortable,  I got several compliments from both men and women. : )
I love it it fits perfectly!

This dress is very flattering and it makes you feel like a Celtic princess! I got this to wear to see the lord of the rings in theaters and it worked great for that but it's "normal" enough that I get to wear it all the time. The weight of the fabric is very nice and it drapes beautifully. It seems to be made well too. I am 5'5" slim hourglass and it's very flattering! The pockets are a nice plus!
Loved the style and the color, ( I got the navy blue). It was just to big.  I ordered the XL. I'm 5'3", about 160lbs.
I bought this to wear to a Renaissance Faire. It is surprisingly of high quality. It’s lined with pockets! I’ve worn it for other occasions as well.

Great quality materials and construction, it's lined to about halfway down the skirt. It has a small zipper on the side but it pulls on easily without it. Very flattering and hangs nicely. I'm 5' and 145 lbs and a large fit perfectly. I'll definitely purchase more items from this company.

Love this dress. Got it originally for a Ren Faire but can wear it to work too. So comfortable. Flattering without being too form fitting. It has great pockets! Think I'm going to get a couple more in other colors. Highly recommend.

Got this for a summer renaissance festival. The dimensions were perfect. It was thick enough to not be see through but light enough to not over heat on a 90+ degree day. I got so many compliments. Highly recommend this dress. I also wore it as the base layer for a fish costume, its multifunctional!

i bought this to weat to  a” costume  optional” fall event  & brought my “mother  nature “ accessories with me  as i was helping with the setup  …i figured i would add them in the ladies room as the guests started to arrive …but OMG  i got SO many compliments on my dress  picking up supplies on the way & at the event , on the DRESS , the best one was from my husband! (he barely notices what I wear anymorehaha )  As it turned out , no one else wore a costume so i skipped the accessories andwas perfectly , even CHARMINGLY  dressed  in my hippy - chic & oh so comfy  /non costumey flowy & $45 dress !  i got a medium it fits flatteringly ( I am 165 lbs & 5.’5 “ ) did i mentionPOCKETS! deep enough to hold  my  phone & scissors  without adding bulges to my ample hips !

All the other rave reviews are correct. Beautiful dress with beautiful details and fabric. The pockets are fantastic. I’m 5’1 and 220ish and the 2xl fit like it was made for me. I did try the XL as well and while it fit and was a little more shapely it also was more snug on the arms and chest area making the arms shorter and just not as flattering. There is a liner to cover almost to the knees. The length on me was a little more than midi and a little less than maxi which is just right for adding another under skirt if you wanted. I added a brown underskirt for a renfest look. It’s also a lovely length without. I could even wear this to church. It’s not a cheap costume dress. I will be ordering more colors!

So, I’m very busty. I have to start with that because the problem that made me return this was just the fit across the bust. While it did technically fit, it was snug enough on the bust that it made the shoulders fit oddly and pulled a bit which made it unflattering ON ME. Emphasis on that because the dress was LOVELY. The details were exactly as shown. The dress felt like a very nice quality! Not cheap or thin feeling. A nice weight material and a lovely silky slip lining. As the add shows it’s not ankle length so if you’re planning to layer with a chemise for a costume or renfaire (as I was) keep that in mind. Was bummed this did work for me as it was really beautiful.

评论概述: Wish it was a V-Neck but it has pockets!
评论详情: Wish it was a V-Neck but it has pockets! Fits perfectly and has pockets! Soft and cool to wear. Plan for a costume but might also wear whenever I feel like it
Just like the picture and great quality. Very flattering too one of my favorite dresses I own!

It's ridiculous how short this dress is! It’s like the manufacturer doesn’t think that anyone above 5 feet tall will ever be wearing one of these! I am 5’5 on a good day and this didn’t even go down to my ankle. It’s about mid calf length at best. I am very upset that I wasted my time and money on this nonsense!

Wore the dress to a Renn festival (with a corset vest) and will wear it again and again. The stitched lace is thick as is the fabric for the dress, it will last many years. It's not low cut, but I pinned one side up to give it a bit more style. It is a heavy type dress, but I was very comfortable, not too hot, and the sleeves are nice and flowy which helped stay cool in the warm weather. It has a small side zipper but I could just pull it on over my head. Great purchase.

Runs very small. Also when adding in the plus size they did not change any other dementions so even if I lost the weight to fit into the waist line of the dress I will never be able to fit it over my chest. And i am not busty. Very poorly designed. Also the sleeves where way to short. Like not enough to be a 3/4 sleeve, just enough to be very obvisly too short! This was one of the biggest disappointments I have purchased in a long time and I shop on TEMU on the regurlar!
Fabric has a good weight to it but is light and breathable, I ordered a size up for my wide shoulders and it fits perfectly

Bought this at my daughter's request and she loves it.
Bought for my cousin’s wedding. I’m 5 foot 4 inches and weigh 180 pounds. I ordered a large dress, but I think medium would have been a good fit instead. Super comfortable and it has pockets!

评论详情: The lining is much shorter than the rest of the dress, making it awkward to move around in it. The fabric is a thin polyester which didn't breathe. I wore it for one costume party, then donated it. It's a shame, because the color is so beautiful! But it's just not comfortable to wear.
Ordered this as a surprise for my wife and she absolutely loved it and when she wears it in public she constantly gets positive comments on it.
I love this dress. It fit as expected and is well made

I was looking for the perfect Viking style dress for my bachelorette party. This is a beautiful dress and if I didn’t already have my wedding dress this would have been perfect for our Viking themed wedding. I felt really pretty in it. I would buy this in other colors too. Wore this for bachelorette and the rehearsal 😍
This is a beautiful dress and it has pockets!
I love this dress so much. It's comfortable and stylish. The color is very rich and it fits as expected. I loved it so much I bought another one in a different color and plan on getting more!
Bought this for my wife for a renaissance festival. She liked the dress and said it fit really comfortably.
It was great so comfortable and mi wife says,
Really charming, but fully functional dress that you can actually comfortably wear for everyday life. It feels like a real dress and not a cheap Ren-Fair costume.

This dress was perfect for my daughter's pictures on the farm. It is a little sheer in the bright sunlight but light enough to be worn on a warm day. The stitching is well done. I always look at stitching to determine the quality of clothing. My daughter has received so many compliments on the dress. And it HAS pockets! I would definitely buy again.
Got the medium and fits well, my bust on the other have was not thrilled to be squashed. If this cup and down... maybe it will fit., Dd does not.

评论概述: Beautiful for a Ren Faire and everyday!
评论详情: I got this specifically for a Renaissance Faire, but I chose this dress because with some artful styling I can wear it everyday too. It's really a beautiful dress! The olive-y green is unusual but still very flattering and the fabric is soft and flows nicely. It's lightweight and hangs well. I'm 5'2", 140 lbs. and the L fit me perfectly. It smelled a little strongly of dye when I first got it, but a half-day of airing outside fixed it without trouble. It's fully lined and it has POCKETS!! A really beautiful dress!
I bought this and one other item from the same seller. Pretty good quality, it even has a lining. The fabrics are cheap but comfortable. Color does seem lighter in person.

Nice dress for RenFair. Fits true to size and it's comfy and has good coverage for sun protection (I'm planning to wear leggings under it). I'm a plus size 5'6" and bought an XL. Flattering cut. Only down side is it's hand wash only.  Very happy with my purchase. Would consider by more dresses from Scarlet Darkness in the future.

It has POCKETS! This dress is cute and well made. I'm 5'5" and have a 35in waist and ordered an XL. I probably could've done with the L for a tighter fit. I don't need to use the side zipper to get the dress on or off.  Dress is comfy. Pockets fit my phone. I used my steamer on it out of the bag and smoothed out easily. I wash cold and hang to dry, doesn't accumulate a ton of wrinkles this way.

评论概述: Gorgeous!! Got it in two colors

Like color and style
The dress fits very well and is very beautiful. Its a bit heavy for hot weather but works well in the winter months :)
Good quality. Very happy

Wanted a green dress for Renn Faire. This was a nice medium to heavy weight fabric and very comfortable, fit well. Much nicer than some of the unfinished dresses from competitors. I will possibly even get this in another colored.
This dress was perfect for Halloween I absolutely loved the fabric and comfort of the dress

I got this so I can dress up just a little for the Ren Faire in my state. And I felt I fit into the background without standing out too much. You can definitely dress it if you want it as a piece of a full-out cosplay. But I enjoyed it with sandals and a flower crown and was happy. It's true to size, not to heavy, and good quality.

I bought this dress for family photos. The medium fits great I’m 5’5” 130 lbs. I’m hoping I can steam the wrinkles out. I love the pockets. Not sure how long the side zipper will last though, it’s not the best quality. But overall it’s worth the price. I love this color, it’s got a Celtic vibe. Would definitely recommend.
I meant to wear this to the Renaissance festival, but got covid got in the way.  I hope to wear it soon!
Beautiful . Will wear at Celtic festival
I love this dress! It fits perfectly at the waist and has a gentle flow when I ‘move. I get lots of comments on it every time I wear it out! Also, IT HAS POCKETS.
I'm 5'11" and it went to just below my knees, overall the quality is nice though!!

评论概述: Great dress for a comfortable costume for RenFaire
评论详情: It fit per sizing instructions. It is very well made. Good quality.  The only down side is that the sleeves are significantly shorter than pictured, and it looks very awkward

评论用户: Love the dress! It’s very comfortable.
评论详情: Love the dress! It’s so beautiful and comfortable.

评论概述: An actual dress, not a costume dress
评论详情: I was looking around for a dress to the ren fair and what came up was a lot of thin fabric and grungy dresses. I bought this one not knowing what to expect and, to be honest with you, it was an incredibly nice dress. The material is thick and not see through, it's also super cute and can be used outside of ren fairs. There's a small area with some material pressing in that can be a little annoying of you don't wear an underdress but it's not that noticable a feel for most people. Highly recommend if your looking for a cute AF and versatile dress.

Super high quality and looks exactly how the product listing looks. The fabric is this and isn't see through at all. The color is an exact match to the picture!! I'm super pleased with my purchase and recommend this dress to everyone who compliments it :)

This dress is very comfortable, looks nice, and has pockets! I got a small sized dress and it fits nicely. The dress isnt too long, and there isnt areas where it looks ill-fitting. Very nice pretty dress!

This is my second dress from this company. The first one was cut in such a weird way, that I was worried about this one because it was the same brand and size. But hands down this is my favorite dress and it has pockets. Crossing my fingers and praying it becomes available in new colors. Great price and true to size, I will own it in every other color except for white.

评论概述: The most delightful medieval style dress
评论详情: I have always been a folky girl and when I saw this dress, especially in this dark green color, I sang Greensleeves in my mind and imagined the green hills of my favorite country Ireland. This is the kind of dress I have been looking for years and if I was younger I would put it to good use, by wearing it on my folk album cover. But even now at 40 it’s not too late to enjoy it’s beauty. It fits me well too, except for being a bit loose in the breast area (I wear 42B bra size).

评论概述: This dress is very well made...
评论详情: The Scarlet Darkness Women Renaissance Dress In Dark Green is not a costume, it is a high quality, well made dress.  For being comprised of 95% Viscose, (Rayon) and 5% Polyester, the material is heavy with rich color.  There is no give in the material, but the the size is on point.  I am a chunky size 18, (ie my clothes are tight right now), but I was able to fit into the XX-Large sized dress.  The dress was pretty tight in the chest and waist, yet my biceps, which are large, went through the more than adequate arm holes and were very comfortable in the beautiful bell sleeves.  A standard sized 18 would fit this dress perfectly.I am extremely impressed with this dress and would have no problem wearing it to a nice restaurant or event.  Yes, you can use it for Halloween or Ren Fair, but to me, the quality is much too high to used only once or twice a year.  I am in love with this dress and will be looking to purchase more items from the Scarlet Darkness Store.  Five Stars.
Very nice! I ordered mine a little too big. That's on me. Its a great material. Very flowy and comfortable. Perfect for the Ren fair and going out in!

I am 5 ft 5, 225 lbs, and normally wear a size 2XL.  I bought a 2XL and it fits perfectly.This dress is really cute.  I like the details and the cut is very flattering.  The sleeves aren't as bell-shaped as in the picture, which is great for me.  I prefer sleeves that don't get in the way all the time.  These are flared sleeves, but not so big that they're in the way.The material is soft and comfortable.  I machine washed it and hung it dry and it looks great.

Absolutely stunning! This Scarlet Darkness Women Renaissance Dress Pirate Peasant Dress Bell Sleeves Tiered Flowy Long Dress is exactly what my wife was looking for. The fabric is of high quality and feels comfortable against the skin. The design is simply breathtaking, featuring gorgeous bell sleeves and tiered flowy design that adds a touch of elegance and femininity. The dress is perfect for any formal occasion or just a casual day out. It fits my wife's body like a glove and the length is just right. We received numerous compliments on her dress when she wore it to a recent event. Overall, we are extremely happy with our purchase and would definitely recommend this dress to anyone looking for a beautiful and comfortable Renaissance style dress!

I recently got this dress and it was way better then I expected. The color os beautiful as is the fit. I did size up because you can never be too careful and I think that was the right choice. The dress seems very well made and it's perfect for the upcoming renaissance festival.  It is comfortable and does have elastic on the waist in the back.

I got this for my 14-year-old, who loves it. The fabric is very flowy and comfortable. It’s mostly viscose, which is a cellulose fiber, like cotton or linen, so it’s cool in hot weather.  The lace inserts are sheer at the bottom level, but there’s a lining that blocks the view through the lace at higher levels, so it’s as opaque as it needs to be, at least the green color we got. The size large fits her hourglass figure comfortably. Also, she loves that it has pockets.  Here are some photos of her in it.

The quality of this dress really shocked me, it is lined and sewn so well. Very quality material and has a great shape to it. Very flowy but fit true to size. The green color is a beautiful deep green and paired nicely with my leather corset belt. Love that it has belle sleeves instead of the elastic cuffed type. This dress is perfect for a renaissance fair or just for everyday wear for the era peeps. Great piece to add to the collection.  OH and it has POCKeTS!!! Always a bonus.

This is the second Scarlet Darkness dress I got in a single shipment and honestly, the fit of this one is, in my opinion, a lot different than the other one.  It could be the style, but this one seems to be truer to the size chart than another one, which is good for this dress, but I wonder about the overall consistency in sizing across the manufacturing of this brand.Scarlet Darkness has really nice designs and I really like the design of this dress.  It fits well.  It is not my everyday style, but for cosplay, it is definitely a keeper.  One thing I noticed was the weight of the dress.  It seems to pull down onto my shoulders, not horribly, but enough to notice.  The skirt is lined, but neither of those layers add a lot of weight.  The only thing that I can think of is the elastic at the waist.  There is a large band of shirred fabric in the back and it seems that the weight is coming from that panel.Looking at the fabric, I would not put this in the dryer on heat.  I have had clothes made of viscose and it tends to shrink.  I would suggest washing in cold on the gentle cycle and hang dry or even dry clean because this fabric has a tendency to wrinkle.

This is my second purchase from Scarlet Darkness, the 1st was a skirt which fit perfect.  This, where I did get the XL, if my boobs were bigger it would not fit.  This is running a little smaller than the skirt but it still fits ok and is comfortable.I like this company because their clothing does not feel flimsy as you would expect from something in this price range.  No, their clothing feels solid and durable.  Although only time will tell on that one.One downside, for me anyway, is the built in slip.  Comes to a little above my knees and... again for me.... is a little too form fitting.  The slip, IMO, should flow with the rest of the skirt area.  I may cut that out and buy something separate.I highly recommend this clothing line if you are into period pieces, cosplay, or just want to step out of the everyday.  Check out their web site, a much larger selection than here on Amazon.

This dress is very pretty.  - It flows - It's comfortable - It's lined - The fabric feels nice on the skin - I looks great when worn - It moves smoothly  I will be looking to other Scarlet Darkness clothes given how nice this is.

评论概述: Good for the price and for specific uses
评论详情: The wife tells me that this fits well for something ordered online without the ability to try it on first, and that it's a bit baggy in the shoulders/waist but otherwise fits well. It also isn't the sort of thing that she plans to use for every day, but for Halloween or if we ever go to a Ren Faire it's just right (especially for the price). We'll also have to see how it holds up to repeated launderings, but right out of the box it is a solid, attractive, dress.

This dress is absolutely stunning! I feel like a princess wearing it, or like I should be going to a renaissance faire. I just wore this around my house for a while when it arrived because it was so fun and comfortable and made me so happy. I've already added a couple of other dresses from this shop to my Amazon cart to buy later because it's such nice quality!

I bought this for an upcoming Ren Faire. I am 5'2", 180 lbs and I ordered a size large. I maybe could have sized down, it's not tight of anything, but I'm glad there is some wiggle room. I was pleasantly surprised by the good quality. There are pockets and a liner. The cut is very cute.

评论概述: Surprisingly lined! Beautiful shade of green!
评论详情: I am usually skeptical about dresses like this one because typically there isn't a liner underneath so the lacey bits end up being see through. This dress however, has a liner, so no need to wear a slip! I was super excited to discover this. There is a zipper down the side under one of the arms. However, I did not need to use the zipper to slip this over my head. I ordered a 2XL. I am 5'3", and admittedly 240 lbs. This size fit perfectly, which was also a nice surprise.  The green is a beautiful rich dark green color. The sleeves are not largely belled, and the perfect length so as not to get accidentally get put into anything. This makes this dress easy to wear for all occasions. The fabric is soft and heavy for draping, yet feels light and airy. I am very impressed with this dress.

At first I was mislead by the size chart and orderred a large. Then returned it to order a size medium. It was correct but it shrunked after washing it (no dryer!) and now it's too small .... can't return because I washed it
One of the pockets was sewed in backwards making it very uncomfortable to wear. It’s a shame because otherwise it would have been pretty to wear.
This dress is really well-made. The details are lovely and the pockets are a god-send. Excellent for festival wear!
Good cowality
It’s like a linen material. Got the medium I feel it’s pretty true to size. Beautiful dress
I have purchased this dress for a medieval cosplay. But the dress is so well made and flattering that it will be my go-to this summer. Bonus feature: it has pockets!!!

It’s true to size. Comfortable and well made. I used it to be ‘earth’ for the 4 elements for Halloween, but I will definitely wear this dress again! It’s just above my ankles. I’m 5’2. This is a large. I’m 155lbs. Hope that helps!
